name: Skull Party: The Home Game
description:
Skull Party: The Home Game brings the Skull Party experience into your home for the first time ever. Pick your favorite skull and blast off into a world of skull luxury.  Skull your friends. Skull your family.  Skull your skull.

  • One level!
  • Four vibrant characters!
  • My first game ever!

Gamepads required to play.  Lemme know if you find any bugs, I might fix them.
